get.summary: Get alarm details for a specific device serial number

parameters.name: serialNumber
parameters.description: Serial number of the device. Example: S111F1202200226

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: The status of the alarms, Default values will fetch alarms with status ACK and NACK

parameters.name: severity
parameters.description: The severity of the alarms, Default value will fetch alarms for all severity

parameters.name: source
parameters.description: The source of the alarms, Default value will fetch alarms for all source

parameters.name: type-id
parameters.description: The type of alarms, Default value will fetch alarms for all alarm types

parameters.name: count
parameters.description: Number of records per request. Possible values: 1 or higher. Default value is 10

parameters.name: sortBy
parameters.description: This field will be used to sort the response data, it must be one of the allowed values. Default value is : time-created

parameters.name: order
parameters.description: To order response data, either in ascending (ASC) or descending (DESC). Default value is : ASC

parameters.description: Serial number of the device. Example: S111F1202200226

serialNumber.description: Serial Number of the Device

slaProfile.description: Description: List of SLA profiles supported by the operator.

latitude.description: Latitude of location of RN/BN device installed, in degrees.

longitude.description: Longitude of location of RN/BN device installed, in degrees.

dataVlan.description: VLAN that is configured to carry user-generated traffic.

primaryBn.description: To fetch response based on primary BN serial number. It is required if connectedToPrimaryBn is true.

connectedBn.description: The BN, where the RN is currently connected.

hierarchy.description: Describes the hierarchy of the network, the device belongs to. It tells about the sector, cell, site, market and region of the operator, the device belongs to.

partNumber.description: System assigned part number of the component. This should be present in particular if the component is also an FRU (field replaceable unit).

softwareVersion.description: Version of software currently running on the device.

firstSeenTimeSeconds.description: It denotes the time in seconds, when the device became active for first time. The value is the timestamp relative to the Unix Epoch (Jan 1, 1970 00:00:00 UTC).

cpiId.description: Id of the Certified Professional Installer of this radio.

heightAgl.description: Height of device installed above ground level (AGL), in meters.

tilt.description: Tilt of the front face of RN/BN device, in degrees.

antennaAzimuth.description: Azimuth of RN/BN device, in degrees.

notes.description: Description about the device.

customAttributes.description: Custom attributes which are set for the device.

activeBank.description: Uboot saved system software flash bank. Valid values are: system1, system2, factory.

currentBank.description: Current booted system software flash bank. This could be different from active-bank when a user explicitly changes on Uboot console or other means without saving to flash. Valid values are: system1, system2, factory

connected.description: It denotes whether the device is connected to the Tarana cloud or not.

managementIp.description: The management IP address of a device.

multiCarrierModeBn.description: Carrier mode of the sector. Allowed values are dual, quad.

multiCarrierModeRn.description: Carrier mode of the sector. Allowed values are dual, quad.

timeLeftSeconds.description: Special telemetry operation time left in seconds

slaProfile.description: SLA profiles supported by the operator.

dataVlan.description: VLAN that is configured to carry user-generated traffic. To set the VLAN to its default, we need to pass '0'

primaryBn.description: To fetch response based on primary BN serial number. It is required if connectedToPrimaryBn is true.

heightAgl.description: Height of device installed above ground level (AGL), in meters.

tilt.description: Tilt of the front face of RN/BN device, in degrees.

antennaAzimuth.description: Azimuth of RN/BN device, in degrees.

cpiId.description: Id of the Certified Professional Installer of this radio.

notes.description: To add a description about device configuration update.

multiCarrierModeRn.description: Carrier mode of the sector. Allowed values are dual, quad.

tilt.description: Tilt of the front face of RN/BN device, in degrees.

antennaAzimuth.description: Azimuth of RN/BN device, in degrees.

serialNumber.description: Serial Number of the Device. Example: S111F1202200226

macAddress.description: MAC address of the Device. Example: 08:F1:1E:09:12:34

type.description: It denotes the type of the device, either RN or BN. Example: BN

sectorId.description: Id of the sector to which the device belongs. Example: 1

softwareVersion.description: Version of software currently running on the device. Example: SYS.A3.B10.123

ip.description: The IP address that the gRPC server listens on. This may be an IPv4 or an IPv6 address. Example: 172.16.1.1

port.description: TCP port on which the gRPC server listens on. Example: 8443

endpoints.description: Model to store communication endpoint of the device

transportSecurity.description: It denotes whether any gRPC transport security is enabled (e.g., TLS or SSL). Example: true

authenticated.description: It denotes whether the device is authenticated or not. Example: true

insecureMode.description: It denotes whether the device is publicly accessible without any VPN. Example: true

masterId.description: Id of the BN device to which the current device (RN) is connected. Example: S111F1202200226

masterName.description: Hostname of the BN device to which the current device (RN) is connected. Example: S111F1202200226

address.description: Address where the device is installed. Example: 12 Bourbon Street, New York

bootTimeSeconds.description: It denotes the time in seconds when the device was last restarted. The value is the timestamp relative to the Unix Epoch (Jan 1, 1970 00:00:00 UTC). Example: 1677820613

uptimeSeconds.description: It denotes the time elapsed in seconds since last start / restart. Example: 174078

losRange.description: It denotes line-of-sight distance between the RN and its BN in meters. Example: 1941.5

bootId.description: Id generated at each boot. This will be used to uniquely identify each boot event. Example: 122758ce526177665d3ece2ac8975f87

lastUpdateTimeSeconds.description: It denotes the time in seconds when last registration message was received from this device. The value is the timestamp relative to the Unix Epoch (Jan 1, 1970 00:00:00 UTC). Example: 1677820613

connected.description: It denotes whether the device is connected to the Tarana cloud or not. Example: true

reachable.description: It denotes whether the device is reachable from the Tarana cloud or not. Example: true

linkState.description: It denotes the state of the link between RN and its BN. Possible values are: connected, disconnected and unknown. Example: connected

partNumber.description: System assigned part number of the component. This should be present in particular if the component is also an FRU (field replaceable unit). Example: 30-0120-001.1.0

loginBanner.description: The console login message displayed before the login prompt, i.e. before a user logs into the system.

activeBank.description: Uboot saved system software flash bank. Valid values are: system1, system2, factory. Example: system2

currentBank.description: Current booted system software flash bank. This could be different from active-bank when a user explicitly changes on Uboot console or other means without saving to flash. Valid values are: system1, system2, factory. Example: system2

bootReason.description: Reason for the system boot recorded by Uboot. Valid values are: cold boot, warm boot, cpu-watchdog, system-watchdog, factory-button, short-button, long-button. Example: warm boot

rebootMessage.description: Description of the system reboot reason. Example: USER_REBOOT:25:user

rfBoardSerialNumber.description: System-assigned serial number of the RF board component. Example: R080F1194000028

rfBoardPartNumber.description: System-assigned part number for the RF board component. This should be present in particular if the component is also an FRU (field replaceable unit). Example: 31-0080-301.3.1

digiBoardSerialNumber.description: System-assigned serial number of the Digi board component. Example: R080F1194000028

digiBoardPartNumber.description: System-assigned part number for the digi board component. This should be present in particular if the component is also an FRU (field replaceable unit). Example: 31-0080-301.3.1
